{{wikipedia|Orpiment}}

{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|し|おう}}
{{IPAchar|/siːwau/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕiːwɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕiːoː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しおう}} compound {{m|zh|雌黄|tr=tsiɛ hwang|lit=female + yellow}}, indicating the mineral [[orpiment]], in contrast to {{m|zh|雄黃|tr=hjuwng hwang|lit=male + yellow}}, indicating the mineral [[realgar]].

[[cognate|Cognate]] and [[homophone]] of {{m|ja|雄黄|tr=kini||realgar}}. Only differentiated by spelling.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|しおう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しおう|hhira=しわう}}

# [[orpiment]], an [[arsenic]] [[sulfide]] [[mineral]]

=====Usage notes=====
This is the most common reading for this kanji compound.

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|石黄|せきおう}} {{qualifier|more common}}
* {{ja-r|雄黄|ゆうおう}} {{qualifier|rare}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=きに}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=きに|黄|tr1=ki|t1=yellow|丹|tr2=ni|t2=earth, reddish earth}}. The kanji are [[ateji]], borrowed from the Chinese term.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|きに}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=きに|rare|possibly|_|obsolete}} [[orpiment]], an [[arsenic]] [[sulfide]] [[mineral]]

=====Synonyms=====
